name: Simple Vote
description:
A FigJam widget to get votes on your teamâ€™s ideas. Get votes anonymously, show who voted, or collect votes in a fully unbiased and secret way and reveal them when you're ready.


Duplicate this widget to all stickies or areas you'd like votes on or select all items you want votes on and the widget will duplicate to them for you.


Key features:

  • Allow multiple votes per user (voting power)
  • Anonymous votes
  • Secret votes (reveal after)
  • Automatically add vote widgets to selected objects
